## 0. Basics

### 0.1 Managing Packages
```{r}
# install.packages("ggplot2")
library(ggplot2)
```

### 0.2 Data Types
```{r results='hold'}
typeof(5)
typeof("text")
typeof(TRUE)
```

### 0.3 Arithmetic with R
```{r results='hold'}
5 + 5 # An addition
5 - 4 # A subtraction
3 * 5 # A multiplication
9 / 3 # A division
2 ^ 5 # Exponentiation
7 %% 3 # Modulo
```

### 0.4 Variable Assignment
```{r}
var1 <- 5
var2 <- 13
var1 + var2
```

## 1. Vectors & Matrices

### 1.1 Creating a vector
```{r}
vec1 <- c(1, 2, 3, 4, 5)
vec1
length(vec1)
```

### 1.2 Getting the components of a vector (slicing)
```{r}
vec1[1]
vec1[1:3]
```
